00149     template<class T>
00150     class QueueEntry{
00151       public:
00152 
00158         QueueEntry(const T & id, float dist): id_(id), dist_(dist){};
00159 
00163         const T & id(){return id_; }
00164 
00168         float dist(){return dist_; }
00169 
00174         class Less{
00175 
00176          public:
00181             bool operator() (const boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<T> > & entry_one, const boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<T> > & entry_two){
00182 
00183                 return entry_one->dist() < entry_two->dist();
00184             }
00185 
00186         };
00187 
00188 
00189       private:
00193         T id_;
00194 
00198         float dist_;
00199 
00200     };
00201 
00202 
00203 
00204     // A small typedef to save work
00205     template<class T>
00206     struct PriorityQueue {
00207         typedef typename QueueEntry<T>::Less Less;
00208         typedef std::priority_queue<boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<T> > , std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<QueueEntry<T> > >, Less > Type;
00209     };
